articles.description: Football suspended in Turkey after referee is punched, plus Champions League build-up as Manchester United face Bayern Munich while Arsenal travel to PSV Eindhoven.
articles.title: Reaction to 'night of shame' - Turkish referee punched

articles.description: Referee Halil Umut Meler is knocked to the ground by a football club president following a Turkish Super Lig game.
articles.title: Referee punched by club president after Turkish top-flight game

articles.description: Andriy Shevchenko had left Dynamo Kyiv four years earlier but, after lifting the Champions League trophy with AC Milan, he had a duty to return.
articles.title: A gift beyond the grave - Shevchenko's vow and victory

articles.description: Shohei Ohtani agrees to defer the majority of his $700m (£557m) deal with Los Angeles Dodgers, according to multiple US sources including the MLB.
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani: Japanese star agrees to defer majority of Los Angeles Dodgers deal

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane returns to England to play Manchester United, who missed out on signing the striker in the summer.
articles.title: 'The move that never happened' - Kane set for Man Utd showdown

articles.description: Why Pakistan's new Test captain Shan Masood faces a tough baptism against Australia in his team's three-Test series.
articles.title: Why new Pakistan captain Masood bucks a long-term trend

articles.description: A stunning late comeback from the Tennessee Titans secures a dramatic 28-27 victory over the Miami Dolphins.
articles.title: Titans beat Dolphins thanks to stunning late comeback

articles.description: BBC Sport gives you the lowdown on how qualifying is shaping up before the final round of group games.
articles.title: What Newcastle & Man Utd need in Champions League

articles.description: Champion Leon Edwards says he and Colby Covington are "total opposites" with the pair set to meet for the welterweight title at UFC 296 in Las Vegas on Saturday.
articles.title: Covington and I are total opposites - Edwards

articles.description: Netball Australia chief executive Kelly Ryan resigns after the governing body reaches an agreement in principle to end a lengthy pay dispute.
articles.title: Netball Australia CEO resigns after pay agreement
